nodes.text: The Alsakan Academy was an Imperial Academy located on the planet Alsakan. Enric Pryde, who would go on to become Allegiant General of the Galactic Empire's successor state, the First Order, attended the Academy at age sixteen in 11 BBY and was given advanced placement there. Pryde was then assigned to the Imperial-class Star Destroyer Steadfast, where he received proper training from an Imperial officer.
The Alsakan Academy was first mentioned in the 2019 reference book Star Wars: The Rise of Skywalker: The Visual Dictionary, written by Pablo Hidalgo.
